message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. I know it's worth a lot to you, and this price allows for a good deal for both of us.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to see if we can come to a better agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $9,000 is closer to what I'm looking for, I'm still not quite there.  I'm willing to come down to $9,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's see if we can close the deal.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $9,250. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
